content.question: If <math> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>b</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </math>, for what value of b is <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>x</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </math> a minimum?

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
